proposals.job_title: Developing crypto bot fot saving statistics about sizes in orderbook
proposals.description: Project goal – to develop a bot that will gather statistics for large orderbook densities on the OKX, Bybit, and Binance exchanges. The project can be divided into three stages, one stage per exchange. For development, it is preferable to use Python. The code must operate asynchronously. We will work with both futures and spot markets. For all detected densities, we analyze their lifetime, rebound percentages, and the volume traded at the density price.
